title: Process a Mandatory Corporate Action
description: A company in a client's portfolio has announced a mandatory stock split, which needs to be reflected in the client's account.

tasks.description: Identify all client accounts holding the security undergoing the corporate action.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds 150 client accounts holding the specified stock.

tasks.description: For each account, calculate the new number of shares based on the stock split ratio (e.g., 2-for-1).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly calculates the post-split share quantity for each account.

tasks.description: Update the holdings in all affected accounts to reflect the corporate action.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the share count in all 150 accounts.
